1.12.2.1.12.2-0.5.0.0:
Added the "type" and "canBeActivatedByFire" properties to Nether portal types.
Bug fixes and improvements.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.4.0.0:
Required corners are now configurable for Nether portal types.
Generated portal frame dropping can now be disabled for Nether portal types.
Bug fixes and improvements.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.3.0.0:
Improved Nether portal types. Ore dictionary names and meta values can now be specified.
Bug fixes and improvements.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.2.0.0:
Implemented Nether portal types.
Bug fixes and improvements.
